code: import React from'react';import{Formik,Form,Field,ErrorMessage}from'formik';import*as Yup from'yup';export default function PassportForm(_ref){let{onSubmit}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Formik,{initialValues:{firstName:'',lastName:''},validationSchema:Yup.object({firstName:Yup.string().matches(/^[a-z\s]+$/i,'Тiльки латиниця').max(32,'Макс. довжина 32 символи').required('Заповнiть поле'),lastName:Yup.string().matches(/^[a-z\s]+$/i,'Тiльки латиниця').max(32,'Макс. довжина 32 символи').required('Заповнiть поле')}),onSubmit:values=>onSubmit(values.firstName,values.lastName)},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Form,{className:"passport_form",id:"passport"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"passport_form-field"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Field,{type:"text",name:"firstName",placeholder:"i\u043C'\u044F"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{className:"passport_form-error",component:"p",name:"firstName"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"passport_form-field"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Field,{type:"text",name:"lastName",placeholder:"\u041F\u0440i\u0437\u0432\u0438\u0449\u0435"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ErrorMessage,{className:"passport_form-error",component:"p",name:"lastName"}))));}
